name: Session Checker
description: Provides ability to check session validity prior to submitting forms for authenticated users

system-settings.name:
Session Checker

This module should be enabled for all projects - it checks prior to form submission that a valid session is in place. Designed for Shibboleth, it may work with other web-server-based authentication types as well.

Enable Debug Logging
If you have the Stanford emLogger external module installed and configured,
you can enable additional debug-level logging through this checkbox

Enable Javascript Console Logging
This will debug to the js console on the client and should only be used for test/dev.
